articles.author: ARNIE STAPLETON AP Pro Football Writer
articles.title: Tom Brady, Drew Brees exit early in changing of the QB guard
articles.description: Suddenly, the old guard looks rather old.
articles.content:
Brady forced a pass that was intercepted and returned for a touchdown, sealing the loss in what could be Brady's final game for New England if he decides to play elsewhere in 2020.
"We've talked about this," Belichick said afterward. "It's the same thing we'… [+1118 chars]
